name: Desert Gay Solidarity
description:
A pastiche of Desert Bus, Desert Gay Solidarity is a Blaseball re-theme of my Giant Bomb fan game. Drive a real-time six hour journey from Yellowstone National Parkpark to the Reader's get together in the desert. Each trip from YELL to READ (or vice-versa) earns you one point.

Note: The crew in your bus is randomly generated. You may have four of the same occupant.


ControllerKeyboard
AccelerateRight Trigger
W
Brake / Reverse
Left Trigger
S
LeftLeft on Left Thumbstick
ARightRight on Left Thumbstick
DVolume Up
Rotate right stick clockwise
Mousewheel Up
Volume Down
Rotate right stick anti-clockwise
Mousewheel Down

Twitter: @bearsdotzone
